snippet: The Museum of Veterans and Military History is being rebuilt after a tornado hit it earlier this year, throwing medals of war heroes into fields of convulsed earth.
abstract: Vilonia Journal; Museum of Veterans and Military History in Vilonia, Ark, is in midst of revival; museum was destroyed by powerful tornado in April, but volunteers and supporters have retrieved much of its collection and erected new building that should withstand future storms.
lead_paragraph: The Museum of Veterans and Military History is being rebuilt after a tornado hit it earlier this year, throwing medals of war heroes into fields of convulsed earth.

headline.main: Torn Apart by Storm, a Tribute to Veterans Is Pieced Together Again
headline.print_headline: Torn Apart by Storm, a Tribute to Veterans Is Pieced Together Again

keywords.value: Museum of Veterans and Military History (Vilonia, Ark)
